desc.cmt_numberOfRealAlgebraicVariables: NY:       number of real variables,                           OMC
desc.cmt_numberOfFunctions: NFUNC:    number of functions used by the simulation,         OMC
desc.cmt_numberOfBooleanParameters: NPBOOL:   number of bool parameters,                          OMC
desc.cmt_numberOfOutputVariables: NO:       number of outputvar on topmodel,                    OMC
desc.cmt_numberOfEventIndicators: NG:       number of zero crossings,                           FMI
desc.cmt_numberOfIntegerParameters: NPINT:    number of int parameters,                           OMC
desc.cmt_numberOfIntegerAlgebraicVariables: NYINT:    number of alg. int variables,                       OMC
desc.cmt_numberOfExternalObjects: NEXT:     number of external objects,                         OMC
desc.cmt_numberOfBooleanAliasVariables: NABOOL:   number of alias bool variables,                     OMC
desc.cmt_numberOfResidualsForInitialization: NR:       number of residuals for initialialization function, OMC
desc.cmt_numberOfStringAlgebraicVariables: NYSTR:    number of alg. string variables,                    OMC
desc.cmt_numberOfTimeEvents: NG_SAM:   number of zero crossings that are samples,          OMC
desc.cmt_numberOfInputVariables: NI:       number of inputvar on topmodel,                     OMC
desc.cmt_numberOfBooleanAlgebraicVariables: NYBOOL:   number of alg. bool variables,                      OMC
desc.cmt_numberOfStringAliasVariables: NASTR:    number of alias string variables,                   OMC
desc.cmt_numberOfStringParameters: NPSTR:    number of string parameters,                        OMC
desc.cmt_numberOfIntegerAliasVariables: NAINT:    number of alias int variables,                      OMC
desc.cmt_numberOfRealAlgebraicAliasVariables: NA:       number of alias variables,                          OMC
